entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
